body: TL when? also dang this shit isnt over huh?

Next volume, Karen's story part 2 will be released December 30th. https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/95012384. Along with KanColle bunny girl Eugen book. Honestly though, Karen seems like a very nice girl.
7539231 Me and my friend want to try threesome, do you want with us? Register on >>> litelink.at/n_hent <<< and write me your name
Wooo it seems like they progressed

Still wish Suzuki could grow up. Right now, even though he loves her, he doesn't seem to know how to express it for a serious relationship. He only knows he gets jealous and wants to monopolize her, but know no other way to let it out other than sex. By the way, there's a light novel adaptation of Iori's route released last year. Anybody read it? Is the story concluded in that one?
Ah yes, Iori is a classic example of "witing tresno jalaran soko kulino", kulino having a sex.

The rejection seems to hit Suzuki hard, since he did try to keep distance from Iori in chapter 4.5. He already got no confidence without the apps, and now he believe there's no way Iori would love him back. Iori in the other hand, starts to become more conscious of him because of the sex (she didn't know him well enough before). Sport festival arc coming, I hope they will progress somewhere. Although with Karen, and Haruka hypnotizing him to fill her thirst for love, things might get more complicated. Next one should be Karen's episode 2.

For those wondering what series this is, it is "Saimin Kanojo 5". Ichiyo Moka is one of my top favorites, highly recommended if you like cute-face waifus with fairly large breasts (not TOO big) and great art (and no NTR afaik).
So we're finally back to the main story. It should be interesting considering what went on in the side stories.
